tutorial.feedback: Please use the rating system under the answers as often as possible. This way, our app is constantly learning, improving itself, and also becoming faster.
tutorial.questions: All your questions should be as precise and short as possible!
tutorial.thanks: Thank you very much and have fun!!
tutorial.title: Feedback
tutorial.ME_PART1: Presentation of the patient (44) with dizziness for five hours. The patient describes the dizziness as rotational vertigo.
tutorial.ME_PART2: Intensification of dizziness after rapid changes in body position. In addition, the patient reports pulsating headaches, photophobia, phonophobia, and nausea. Worsening of the headaches with physical exertion.
tutorial.ME_PART4: Relief of the headaches when lying down in a darkened room. Denial of visual disturbances, hearing loss, discharge from the ear, seizures, confusion, a recent loss of consciousness, and somnolence.
tutorial.ME_PART6: Noxen: Smoker: 14py (10 cigarettes daily for 28 years). Alcohol consumption 2 - 4 x / month, each time 1 - 2 standard drinks / day.
tutorial.ME_PART7: What is the most likely diagnosis?

description.0: In the next steps, we will show you how you can best use our app for your studies / training.
description.1: Ask general questions, such as, 'How is stomach acid produced?', 'What can you tell me about the RAAS?', 'What interaction occurs if I take beta blockers, ACE inhibitors, and magnesium and why?'
description.2: Have our app solve calculation tasks and reaction equations for you and explain them.
description.3: If an answer was not detailed enough for you, or if you could not understand the explanation, just have it explained to you again in more detail and more simply. 'Please describe more detailed and simpler'
description.7: Please use the rating system under the answers as often as possible. This way, our app is constantly learning, improving itself, and also becoming faster.

description.0: In the next steps, we will show you how you can best use our app for your studies / training.
description.1: Ask general questions, such as, 'How is stomach acid produced?', 'What can you tell me about the RAAS?', 'What interaction occurs if I take beta blockers, ACE inhibitors, and magnesium and why?'
description.4: Have our app solve calculation tasks and reaction equations for you and explain them.
description.5: If an answer was not detailed enough for you, or if you could not understand the explanation, just have it explained to you again in more detail and more simply. 'Please describe more detailed and simpler'

description.0: In the next steps, we will show you how you can best use our app for your PTA training.
description.1: Ask general questions, such as, 'What is sulfuric acid?', or 'Why is sulfuric acid acidic?', or 'What should I pay attention to when advising a customer in the pharmacy who is taking beta blockers, ACE inhibitors, and magnesium?'
description.2: Have our app solve calculation tasks and chemical reaction equations for you and explain them.
description.3: If an answer was not detailed enough for you, or if you could not understand the explanation, just have it explained to you again in more detail and more simply. 'Please describe more detailed and simpler'

description.0: In the next steps, we will show you how you can best use our app for your pharmacy studies.
description.1: Ask general questions, such as, 'What is sulfuric acid?', or 'Why is sulfuric acid acidic?', or 'Tell me about interactions that occur when I take beta blockers, ACE inhibitors, and magnesium?'
description.2: Have our app solve calculation tasks and chemical reaction equations for you and explain them.
description.3: If an answer was not detailed enough for you, or if you could not understand the explanation, just have it explained to you again in more detail and more simply. 'Please describe more detailed and simpler'

description.0: In den nächsten Schritten zeigen wir dir, wie du unsere App am besten für dein Veterinärmedizin-Studium nutzen kannst.
description.1: Stelle allgemeine Fragen, wie z.B. ,,Was ist Kokzidiose?”, ,,Was kannst du mir zur Brönsted Säure-Base Theorie erzählen?”, ,,Was ist der Citratzyklus?”
description.2: Lasse von unserer App Rechenaufgaben und Reaktionsgleichungen lösen und dir diese erklären.
description.3: Falls dir eine Antwort nicht ausführlich genug war, oder du die Erklärung nicht verstehen konntest, lasse sie dir einfach nochmal detaillierter und einfacher erklären. ,,Bitte beschreibe ausführlicher und einfacher”
description.7: Bitte benutze möglichst häufig das Bewertungssystem unter den Antworten. Dadurch lernt unsere App ständig dazu, verbessert sich selbst und wird zudem schneller.

description.0: In den nächsten Schritten zeigen wir dir, wie du unsere App am besten für dein Zahnmedizin-Studium nutzen kannst.
description.1: Stelle allgemeine Fragen, wie z.B. ,,Was ist Fissurenversieglung?”, ,,Was kannst du mir zur Bisphosphonattherapie erzählen?”, ,,Was ist der Citratzyklus?”
description.2: Lasse von unserer App Rechenaufgaben und Reaktionsgleichungen lösen und dir diese erklären.
description.3: Falls dir eine Antwort nicht ausführlich genug war, oder du die Erklärung nicht verstehen konntest, lasse sie dir einfach nochmal detaillierter und einfacher erklären. ,,Bitte beschreibe ausführlicher und einfacher”
description.7: Bitte benutze möglichst häufig das Bewertungssystem unter den Antworten. Dadurch lernt unsere App ständig dazu, verbessert sich selbst und wird zudem schneller.
